name: NodePsTaskWrapper
description: Node PS Task Wrapper To Load on non Windows OS

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run transpile
scripts.clean: rimraf ./dist/src && rimraf ./dist/test && rimraf ./task/*.js && rimraf ./task/*.js.map && rimraf ./task/node_modules && rimraf ./*.js && rimraf ./*.js.map && rimraf ./node_modules && rimraf ./*.ps1 && rimraf ./icon.png && rimraf ./task.json

author: Ove Lartelius
